thought: The payment options are not listed on the website, and the privacy policy is unclear. Based on the combination of unusually low prices, unclear privacy policy, and absence of payment options, I can conclude that the website https://vivogermany.com/ is a scam website. {

observation.reason: The website offers unusually low prices for shoes has an unclear privacy policy and does not list any payment options indicating that it is likely a scam website.
